itemInfo.itemDesc:
A cookie made with beehive filled with honey. 
- Unique effect: Fishing Speed Rank +1 for 110 min.
 Weight Limit +50LT for 110 min.
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30 min.

item.name: Wild Beehive
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be Processed for use as a Cooking ingredient.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by shooting a Wooden Beehive with a Matchlock.

- Usage: Beehive Cookie, etc.

item.name: Wild Beehive
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be Processed for use as a Cooking ingredient.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by shooting a Wooden Beehive with a Matchlock.

- Usage: Beehive Cookie, etc.

item.name: Wheat Dough
item.desc:
A product made by Shaking Wheat Flour obtained through Grinding together with Mineral Water purchased at a Shop.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Shaking.

- Usage: Exotic Herbal Wine, Soft Bread, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Milk
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest. It can be Processed into other Cooking ingredients.\n\n- Usage: Cream, Cheese, Fruit Pudding, etc.

item.name: Egg
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Soft Bread, Omelet, etc.

item.name: Cooking Honey
item.desc:
A natural resource originally obtained through Gathering that has been Processed for use as a Cooking Ingredient.
- How to Obtain: It can be produced by shooting a Wooden Beehive with a Matchlock and then Grinding the acquired Beehive.

- Usage: Oatmeal, Tea With Fine Scent, etc.

item.name: Cooking Honey
item.desc:
A natural resource originally obtained through Gathering that has been Processed for use as a Cooking Ingredient.
- How to Obtain: It can be produced by shooting a Wooden Beehive with a Matchlock and then Grinding the acquired Beehive.

- Usage: Oatmeal, Tea With Fine Scent, etc.

item.name: Wheat Dough
item.desc:
A product made by Shaking Wheat Flour obtained through Grinding together with Mineral Water purchased at a Shop.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Shaking.

- Usage: Exotic Herbal Wine, Soft Bread, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Milk
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest. It can be Processed into other Cooking ingredients.\n\n- Usage: Cream, Cheese, Fruit Pudding, etc.
